django.middleware.gzip
======================

.. py:module:: django.middleware.gzip


Attributes
----------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.middleware.gzip.re_accepts_gzip


Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.middleware.gzip.GZipMiddleware


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:data:: re_accepts_gzip

.. py:class:: GZipMiddleware

   Bases: :py:obj:`django.utils.deprecation.MiddlewareMixin`


   Compress content if the browser allows gzip compression.
   Set the Vary header accordingly, so that caches will base their storage
   on the Accept-Encoding header.


   .. py:attribute:: max_random_bytes
      :value: 100



   .. py:method:: process_response(request, response)
